meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sallow.
meanings.sent1: Her sallownesses made her look unwell.
meanings.sent2: The doctor noted the sallownesses of the patient's skin.
meanings.sent3: Despite his sallownesses, he had a bright smile.
meanings.sent4: The sallownesses of the room's walls gave it a gloomy feel.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the sallownesses of autumn leaves in his painting.

meanings.sent1: The sallownesses of her face indicated she was sick.
meanings.sent2: He had a natural sallownesses that made him unique.
meanings.sent3: The sallownesses of the banana peel made it look unappetizing.
meanings.sent4: The sallownesses of the old photograph gave it a nostalgic feel.
meanings.sent5: The sallownesses of the moonlight cast an eerie glow over the landscape.
